DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 4 , single center , open label , 4 period , 2 treatment , crossover , drug-drug interaction study .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study Assess Effects Steady State Pitavastatin 4 mg Rosuvastatin 40 mg Steady-State Warfarin Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subject healthy adult male female volunteer age 18 45 year , inclusive Subject body mass index 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive Subject able willing abstain alcohol , grapefruit , caffeine Subject clinically relevant abnormality basis medical history , physical examination , vital sign Subject clinically relevant outofrange prothrombin time ( PT ) , activate partial thromboplastin time , fibrinogen , protein C , protein S Subject abnormal prolongation bleeding time Screening Subject hematuria urinalysis Subject personal family history coagulation bleeding disorder
